definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: God loves you infinitely more than you can imagine.
sentences.chinese: 神的愛遠超過你所能想像的。

sentences.english: But later I knew that your bearing is far beyond my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 然而後來我才明白，你的氣度是遠超過我的想像的。

sentences.english: Mr Obama has managed to develop a political career far more lucrative than those of his predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬政治生涯的“錢途”遠超過他的前任們。

sentences.english: He in Peruse people's heart is much more important than Bolivar.
sentences.chinese: 他在祕魯人民心中的地位遠超過玻利瓦爾。
而今天這個數字遠超過一億三千多萬。

sentences.english: There are many, more than in a two-legged encounter.
sentences.chinese: 很多未知因素，遠超過兩回合的比賽制。

sentences.english: The Phoenix as a preamp is far exceeding my expectations.
sentences.chinese: 鳳凰作爲前級遠超過我的期望。

sentences.english: The transformation wrought by outflows was much more severe than the earlier reionization.
sentences.chinese: 噴出物造成的轉變遠超過先前的再遊離過程。

sentences.english: Women suffer significantly more fire-related injuries and deaths than men.
sentences.chinese: 婦女因失火而受傷和死亡的情況遠超過男性。

sentences.english: It would appear that the reasons go deeper than Thatcher's frail health.
sentences.chinese: 其中的原由似乎遠超過撒切爾夫人虛弱的健康狀況。

sentences.english: Of course, the winners are far outnumbered by the losers.
sentences.chinese: 當然，勝利者從數據上已經遠超過失敗者。

sentences.english: I am simply saying that the non-calls easily outnumber the superstar calls.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在說，沒有吹罰的次數遠超過明星哨。

sentences.english: He really likes antique art much more than modern art.
sentences.chinese: 他的確喜愛古典藝術遠超過現代藝術。

sentences.english: Wind carries your scent even farther than 25 feet, so make you're down wind.
sentences.chinese: 風攜帶你的氣味甚至遠超過25英尺，所以請你順風。

sentences.english: The main public room in the hotel has large windows that look far out over Death Valley.
sentences.chinese: 主要在酒店的公共房間有大窗戶，看遠超過死谷。
